ComicInfo.Summary:
Born from the DNA of the Danger Doll Squad and then rocketed into space. Amalgama: Space Zombie’s first epic adventure concludes here, forging the legend of comic’s newest sci-fi superstar!!
Features 3 regular and risqué variants, including the special Bryan Baugh variants!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------------------------------|--------------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Winston Young | 2 | | C | Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Bryan Baugh | 3 | | D | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Bryan Baugh | 4 | | E | Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Danielle Gransaull | 5 | | F | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Danielle Gransaull | 6 |
ComicInfo.Title: Part Four
